document_data.caption: A map showing Bazaar Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Bazaar Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Bazaar Street''' was a major road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Bazaar Street was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road was almost circular in shape, branching west from the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] on the east side of the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]], passing along the southern edge of the Market, and then turning north around the western end of the Market to end on [[Trader's Way (Waterdeep)|Trader's Way]]. Many of the largest roads within the Castle Ward originated on Bazaar Street including [[Calamastyr Lane]], the [[Street of Silks]], the [[Street of Silver]], [[Warrior's Way]], and the [[Street of Bells]]. Other smaller roads connecting with Bazaar Street included [[Tharleon Street]], [[Alnether Street]], and [[Aka Way]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[The Blue Baldric]], a nightclub
* [[The Singing Sword]], tavern
